Description: Papyrus. Early Demotic letter. The top and bottom margins are preserved. The text is written extremely close to the edge of the papyrus on both sides. Recto: 10 lines. On the verso there are very faint traces of what may be a washed-off text.
Curator's comments: Under study by Naglaa Ezzeldeen (Helwan University, Cairo).
There is no internal address. The letter begins with the pious wish formula (by Pre). There is no date or scribe mentioned.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381002) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381002)
